# Outputs

## Overview of End of Project Outputs {.smaller}

```{r}
library(readxl)
library(dplyr)
outputs <- read_excel("assets/PP-output-outcomes.xlsx", sheet = "Outputs")
outputs |> select(Code, OUTPUT) |> knitr::kable()
```

## EOP Output 1 {.smaller}

```{r}
slice(outputs,1) |> select(OUTPUT:BASELINE) |> t()|> knitr::kable()
```


## EOP Output 2 {.smaller}

```{r}
#| results: "asis"
slice(outputs,2) |> select(OUTPUT:`WORK PACKAGES`) |> t()|> knitr::kable()
sprintf("INDICATORS:\n\n%s",{slice(outputs,2) |> pull(`INDICATOR/S`)}) |> cat()

```

## EOP Output 2 {.smaller}

```{r}
#| results: "asis"
sprintf("**MEASURE**:\n\n%s\n\n**Data SOURCE/S**:\n\n%s",
  {slice(outputs,2) |> pull(`MEASURE`)},
  {slice(outputs,2) |> pull(`DATA SOURCE/S`)}) |> cat()


```

# Outcomes

outcomes <- read_excel("assets/PP-output-outcomes.xlsx", sheet = "Outcomes")
